feature_short_description: Automatic export of processed invoices to accounting systems and databases
feature_description:
## Automatic Export

Automatic Export enables seamless integration with accounting and ERP systems by automatically pushing processed invoice data to external platforms without manual intervention.

### Capabilities
- One-click integration with major accounting platforms
- Scheduled automatic exports
- Real-time data synchronization
- Format conversion (JSON, XML, CSV)
- Error logging and retry mechanisms

### Supported Systems
- QuickBooks Online
- Xero
- NetSuite
- Sage Intacct
- Custom API endpoints

### Benefits
- Eliminates manual data entry
- Reduces processing time
- Ensures data consistency
- Enables real-time reporting
